0.9.name: wordpress/focus
0.9.description: Focus is a great theme for showing off your videos. It supports videos hosted on other sites like YouTube and Vimeo through oEmbed. You can even self host your videos - Focus has a gorgeous custom video player for MP4s. Focus can be used as a standard video blog or even an educational video site.
